sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-list-item >
    <v-card class="elevation-3 rounded-lg task-card" flat>
      <v-card-body class="m-card">
        <v-card-title>{{ task.title }}</v-card-title>
        <v-card-subtitle>{{ task.description }}</v-card-subtitle>
      </v-card-body>
    </v-card>

  </v-list-item>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: 'TaskCard',
  props: {
    task: {
      type: Object,
      required: true
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style>
.v-list-item-m {
  margin-bottom: 10px; 
  padding: 36px;
}

.elevation-3 {
  box-shadow: 0px 4px 6px -1px rgba(0,0,0,0.1), 0px 2px 4px -1px rgba(0,0,0,0.07);
}

.rounded-lg {
  border-radius: 12px; /* Ajuste o raio conforme necessário */
}

.task-card {
  width: 100%; /* Usa 100% da largura disponível no item da lista */
  background-color: white; /* Fundo branco */
  max-width: 320px;
}

.m-card {
  padding: 14px;
  width: 100%;
}
</style>
